snippet: The deal is the latest by a Japanese insurer seeking to expand its operations globally, as insurers seek growth opportunities outside their home market.
abstract: Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance Company announces plan to buy British insurer Amlin in effort to expand operations outside Japan.
lead_paragraph: The deal is the latest by a Japanese insurer seeking to expand its operations globally, as insurers seek growth opportunities outside their home market.

headline.main: Mitsui Sumitomo of Japan to Acquire British Insurer Amlin
